name: react-native-brightcove-ima-player
description: A React Native implementation of Brightcove Player SDK.

scripts.post-patch: npm version patch && git push origin --all && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.post-minor: npm version minor && git push origin --all && git push origin --tags && npm publish

author: Ryota Mannari <info@manse.jp> (https://github.com/manse)
